description:
Ryou-Ouki`s appearance is similar to a cross between a cat and a rabbit, and for this reason Ryou-Ouki is commonly referred to as a cabbit.
Ryou-Ouki is usually a shapechanger, but the shapes, aside from the "cabbit" form, vary according to the series. Ryou-Ouki `s background and other traits vary considerably from one series to another.
name: Ryou-Ouki
